displayProperties.name: Mobius Conduit
displayProperties.description: Allows for early deactivation of an Arc Staff.

displayProperties.name: Shatter Shot
displayProperties.description: This weapon's uncharged projectiles deal bonus damage to Stasis crystals and frozen targets. Rapidly destroying multiple Stasis crystals reloads this weapon from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Widow's Silk
displayProperties.description:
You have an additional grenade charge.

Your Grappling Hook creates a Grapple Tangle at the grapple point.

displayProperties.name: Multi-Siphon Mods
displayProperties.description: Grants access to Helmet armor mods that combine the effects of the Strand Siphon and Arc Siphon mods.

displayProperties.name: Authorized Mods: Melee
displayProperties.description: The armor energy costs of all armor mods affecting your melee are significantly discounted.

displayProperties.name: Authorized Mods: Strand
displayProperties.description: The armor energy costs of all armor mods affecting your Strand weapons are significantly discounted.

displayProperties.name: Authorized Mods: Void
displayProperties.description: The armor energy costs of all armor mods affecting your Void weapons are significantly discounted.

displayProperties.name: Authorized Mods: Arc
displayProperties.description: The armor energy costs of all armor mods affecting your Arc weapons are significantly discounted.

displayProperties.name: Ember of Tempering
displayProperties.description:
Solar weapon final blows grant you and your allies increased recovery for a short duration. Stacks 3 times.

While Ember of Tempering is active, your weapons have increased airborne effectiveness, and your Solar weapon final blows create a Firesprite.

displayProperties.name: Halberdier's Reach
displayProperties.description: Improves Glaive melee. Glaive projectile final blows cause detonations.

displayProperties.name: Bipod
displayProperties.description: Increases Rocket Launcher ammo and reserves, but reduces damage, blast radius, and reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Collective Action
displayProperties.description:
Collecting elemental pickups or throwing a Strand Tangle grants a stacking period of increased damage.

Elemental pickups include Firesprites, Void Breaches, Stasis Shards, Ionic Traces, and Strand Tangles.

displayProperties.name: Thunderous Retort
displayProperties.description: Grants bonus Arc Super damage if cast while critically wounded or while Amplified. Lasts until the end of the Super activation.

displayProperties.name: Rapid-Fire Glaive
displayProperties.description: [Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield

displayProperties.name: Resurrected Shadow
displayProperties.description: Adds a resurrected shadow appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Unspun Fate
displayProperties.description: Adds an unspun fate appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Crystalline Transistor
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows with Kinetic weapons create an explosion in the element of your subclass.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: The Wanderer
displayProperties.description:
Tangles that you throw attach to targets and detonate into a suspending burst.

Threadling final blows create a Tangle.

displayProperties.name: Controlled Burst
displayProperties.description: Landing every shot in a burst grants this weapon increased damage and reduced charge time for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Burning Maul
displayProperties.description:
Summon a flaming maul and crush targets with the force of an earthquake.

[Light Attack]  : Spin the maul in a circle around you, damaging nearby targets.

[Heavy Attack]  : Slam the maul to the ground and create a cyclone of flames that seeks targets, dealing damage and scorching them.

displayProperties.name: Invisible Hand
displayProperties.description: Repeatedly missing targets increases this weapon's stability for a short time. This buff lasts for a longer duration after a target is hit.

displayProperties.name: Mercy
displayProperties.description: Forgives one loss per run. Forgives a second loss if you have not yet been flawless this week.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Charge
displayProperties.description: Collecting a Firesprite, Ionic Trace, Stasis shard, or Void Breach, or destroying a Strand Tangle has an escalating chance to give you Armor Charge.

displayProperties.name: Threaded Specter
displayProperties.description:
Activating your class ability leaves behind a decoy woven from [Strand] Strand matter that draws the attention of nearby combatants.

After taking significant damage or when combatants approach, the decoy detonates, dealing damage and releasing Threadlings that seek out and attack nearby foes.

displayProperties.name: Eddy Current
displayProperties.description: Temporarily increases reload speed after sprinting; increased reload speed has a longer duration. This effect is significantly improved when you are amplified.

displayProperties.name: Fragile Focus
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus range until your shield is destroyed. The bonus returns once your shield has regenerated to full strength.

displayProperties.name: Heat Sink
displayProperties.description: Overheat damage is reduced while not aiming down sights. While overheated, sustained fire scorches your target.

displayProperties.name: Unsated Hunger
displayProperties.description:
Increased handling, reload speed, and stability when no abilities are fully charged.

Swords gain increased guard resistance and charge rate instead.

displayProperties.name: Force Multiplier
displayProperties.description: Shotgun final blows grant an overshield.

displayProperties.name: Nova Warp
displayProperties.description:
Step between dimensions to subvert the laws of physics.

[Super Secondary]  : Teleport a short distance.

[Super Primary]  : Unleash a deadly Void eruption. A fully charged attack makes targets volatile.

displayProperties.name: Chaos Reach
displayProperties.description:
Unleash a long-range channeled beam of concentrated Arc energy. Sustained damage on a single target creates a jolting lightning strike at their position.

 [Super]  while active to deactivate your Super early, saving Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Stormtrance
displayProperties.description:
Chain Arc Lightning from your hands to electrify targets with devastating streams of Arc Light that intensify over time. Casting Stormtrance creates a jolting shockwave underneath you.

[Sprint]  : Teleport forward, consuming a small amount of Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Mercy
displayProperties.description: Final loss has been forgiven.

displayProperties.name: Rites of Ember
displayProperties.description: Daybreak projectiles deal more damage. Gain improved scorch.

displayProperties.name: Adaptive Ordnance
displayProperties.description: Defeating 4 or more combatants in a single volley increases the damage of the next volley and refunds ammunition.

displayProperties.name: Wealth
displayProperties.description: Increased reputation from match wins on a ticket.

displayProperties.name: Strand Soldier
displayProperties.description: Your Strand weapons gain Unraveling Rounds whenever you gain Woven Mail while your Strand subclass is equipped.

displayProperties.name: Protective Breach
displayProperties.description: Picking up a Void Breach gives you an overshield or refreshes your existing overshield.

displayProperties.name: Origin Hones
displayProperties.description: Weapons with the Unsated Hunger, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Harmonic Resonance, and Noble Deeds traits are always overcharged weapons for you when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Amplified Shielding
displayProperties.description: Gain damage resistance while amplified.

displayProperties.name: Counter Charge
displayProperties.description: Gain a stack of Armor Charge when you stun a Champion.

displayProperties.name: Fists of Havoc
displayProperties.description:
Supercharge your fists and slam the ground with the force of a maelstrom. While active:

[Light Attack]  : Quickly charge forward, dealing damage to any impacted targets.

[Heavy Attack] : Slam your fists to the ground, blinding targets and dealing damage in an area around you, leaving aftershocks in your wake. Performing a slam from the air deals additional damage.

displayProperties.name: Overcharge Capacitor
displayProperties.description: Sprinting, sliding, and firing build a charge.

displayProperties.name: Barri-nade
displayProperties.description: Using your class ability grants a Barricade grenade.

displayProperties.name: Spectral Blades
displayProperties.description:
Summon a pair of deadly Void blades and stalk the battlefield in a veil of shadows.

[Light Attack]  : Perform a quick melee attack.

[Heavy Attack]  : Perform a heavy attack that weakens your target, and once again vanish from sight.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Harvest
displayProperties.description: Defeating weakened targets creates an Orb of Power and a Void Breach.

displayProperties.name: Disaster Plan
displayProperties.description:
Picking up ammunition increases this weapon's flinch resistance and range, which lasts until it is fired again.

Swords gain a large increase to charge rate instead.

displayProperties.name: Adamantine Brace
displayProperties.description: Bow charges can be held indefinitely for increased damage.

displayProperties.name: Conserve Momentum
displayProperties.description: Hits decrease charge time.

displayProperties.name: Explosive Pact
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus stability and reload speed when activating a grenade ability. Healing grenades and grenade final blows grant additional stacks of the bonus.

displayProperties.name: Fragile Focus
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus range until your shield is destroyed. The bonus returns more quickly once your shield has regenerated to full strength.

displayProperties.name: Eddy Current
displayProperties.description: Temporarily increases reload speed after sprinting. This effect is improved when you are amplified.

displayProperties.name: Bipod
displayProperties.description: Increases Rocket Launcher ammo and reserves, but reduces damage. Blast radius and reload speed are slightly reduced.

displayProperties.name: Planetary Torrent
displayProperties.description: Rift periodically releases an Arc shockwave.

displayProperties.name: Nightmare Fuel
displayProperties.description: Melee damage reloads weapons and boosts movement speed and jump height.

displayProperties.name: Division Computed
displayProperties.description:
Adds a division computed appearance to your transmat effects.

This effect will change to reflect your current Competitive Division in Crucible.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Amped Up
displayProperties.description: Stay amplified longer while your Arc subclass is equipped.

displayProperties.name: Thunderous Retort
displayProperties.description: Grants bonus Arc Super damage if cast while critically wounded or while Amplified. Lasts until the end of the Super activation.

displayProperties.name: Improved Unraveling
displayProperties.description: Increases the amount of damage dealt by unraveling a target.

displayProperties.name: Deeper Origins
displayProperties.description: Greatly improves the benefits provided by the Unsated Hunger, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Harmonic Resonance, and Noble Deeds traits.

displayProperties.name: Unto the Breach
displayProperties.description: Defeating a Void debuffed target creates a Void Breach while your Void subclass is equipped.

displayProperties.name: Mercy
displayProperties.description: First loss has been forgiven.

displayProperties.name: Forgotten Treasures
displayProperties.description: When you redeem a Salvage Key or a Deep Dive Key, you have a chance to earn an additional Deep Engram.

displayProperties.name: Powerful Attraction
displayProperties.description: Automatically collects nearby Orbs of Power when you activate your class ability.

displayProperties.name: Shoot to Loot
displayProperties.description: Shooting an Orb of Power picks it up. Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves. Increases range.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Hand Cannon
displayProperties.description: Aiming down the sights of a Hand Cannon for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Hand Cannons are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Overload Scout Rifle
displayProperties.description: Landing consecutive hits on combatants with any Scout Rifle you are wielding causes disruption, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering their damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Scout Rifles are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Auto Rifle
displayProperties.description: Your equipped Auto Rifles fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Auto Rifles are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Overload Trace Rifles
displayProperties.description: Uninterrupted fire from your equipped Trace Rifles causes the beam to stun combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering their damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Trace Rifles are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Glaive
displayProperties.description: Glaives you wield fire a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Glaives are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Assassin's Blade
displayProperties.description: Sword final blows boost movement speed and damage.

displayProperties.name: Discord
displayProperties.description: Final blows with another weapon grant this weapon increased speed for aiming down sights, accuracy, and airborne effectiveness for a short time. When Discord is active, final blows refund ammo.

displayProperties.name: Static Buildup
displayProperties.description: While amplified, this weapon gradually gains overcharge.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Protective Weave
displayProperties.description: Fire at your allies to grant Woven Mail.

displayProperties.name: Methane Burst
displayProperties.description: Adds a methane burst appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Regenerative Motion
displayProperties.description: Sprinting gradually reloads this weapon.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Controlled Burst
displayProperties.description: Landing every shot in a burst grants this weapon increased damage and reduced charge time for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Weft Cutter
displayProperties.description: Dealing sustained damage severs the target.

displayProperties.name: Invisible Hand
displayProperties.description: Repeatedly missing targets increases this weapon's stability for a short time. This buff lasts for a short duration after a target is hit.

displayProperties.name: Tesseract
displayProperties.description: [Heavy Attack]  : Use while sprinting with full energy to launch a repeatable heavy blink attack.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Discord
displayProperties.description: Final blows with another weapon grant this weapon increased speed aiming down sights, accuracy, and airborne effectiveness for a longer duration. When Discord is active, final blows refund ammo.

displayProperties.name: Gordian Knot
displayProperties.description: Special reload and then fire to create a Grapple Tangle at the targeted point.

displayProperties.name: Flechette Storm
displayProperties.description:
While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to leap into the air, knocking nearby targets away and dealing damage.

While airborne, activate your charged melee again to launch a cluster of damaging, Unraveling projectiles. Repeatedly activating melee will chain additional throws.

displayProperties.name: Collective Action
displayProperties.description:
Collecting elemental pickups or throwing a Strand Tangle grants a longer initial period of increased damage, and an improved stacking period of increased damage.

Elemental pickups include Firesprites, Void Breaches, Stasis Shards, Ionic Traces, and Strand Tangles.

displayProperties.name: Rainmaker
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows have a chance to create a shower of Glimmer.

displayProperties.name: Shoot to Loot
displayProperties.description: Shooting an Orb of Power picks it up. Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Deep Sea Locksmith
displayProperties.description: When you redeem a Salvage Key, you have a chance to earn a Deep Dive Key.

displayProperties.name: High Priority
displayProperties.description: Improves Trace Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Squad Goals
displayProperties.description:
Performing a finisher while you are amplified grants Amplified to nearby allies when your Arc subclass is equipped. 

Performing a finisher while you have Woven Mail grants Woven Mail to nearby allies when your Strand subclass is equipped. 

Performing a finisher while you have Devour grants Devour to nearby allies when your Void subclass is equipped.

displayProperties.name: Lightning Strikes Twice
displayProperties.description: After throwing an Arc grenade, gain increased grenade recharge for a short time. Arc final blows extend the duration of this benefit.

displayProperties.name: Shock and Awe
displayProperties.description: Arc final blows while you are amplified summon a burst of lightning that damages and jolts targets.

displayProperties.name: Supernova
displayProperties.description: Picking up a Void Breach causes your next source of Void damage to create a large weakening pulse.

displayProperties.name: Conductive Cosmic Needle
displayProperties.description: Targets affected by Strand debuffs take increased damage from Arc and Void abilities.

displayProperties.name: Resolute
displayProperties.description: Casting Fists of Havoc grants an overshield. Arc final blows grant a weapon damage bonus.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.
Your [Stasis] Stasis armor pieces increase your overall Power and grant bonus damage with Stasis weapons against combatant [Arc] Arc, [Solar] Solar, and [Void] Void shields.
displayProperties.name: Stasis Synergy

displayProperties.description: Your [Arc] Arc armor pieces increase your overall Power and grant bonus damage with [Arc] Arc weapons against combatant [Solar] Solar and [Void] Void shields.
displayProperties.name: Arc Synergy

displayProperties.description: Your [Void] Void armor pieces increase your overall Power and grant bonus damage with [Void] Void weapons against combatant [Arc] Arc and [Solar] Solar shields.

displayProperties.description: Your [Kill] Strand armor pieces increase your overall Power and grant bonus damage with Strand weapons against combatant [Arc] Arc, [Solar] Solar, and [Void] Void shields.
displayProperties.name: Strand Synergy
